body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Joshua Reed and the customer's name is Samantha Collins.  The conversation is about MetaCar (a Car Rental Agency ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling MetaCar. My name is Joshua Reed, and I'm here to assist you today.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's a pleasure to meet you, Samantha! How can I help you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling a bit frustrated with my recent rental experience.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand how that can be upsetting. I'm here to help! Could you please provide me with your reservation number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Samantha. May I also have your phone number to better assist you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that. Let me look into your reservation and see how we can resolve your issue.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate that, Joshua. I'd like to get this sorted out as soon as possible.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely, Samantha! I will do my best to resolve this right away. Thank you for your patience.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I want to thank you for your time today, and I hope we can resolve this issue quickly. Have a great day!
